com.neatnodes.algorithm

Class StaticFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neatnodes.algorithm.StaticFunctions

  • class StaticFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static methods that implement the behaviour required by the NEAT algorithm.
    Author:
    Sam Griffin

      Constructor and Description
      StaticFunctions()

    • Method Detail

      • calculateCompatabilityDistance

        static double calculateCompatabilityDistance(Genome g1,
                                             Genome g2,
                                             Configuration configuration)
        Calculates the compatibility distance between two Genomes.
        Parameters:
        g1 - The first Genome.
        g2 - The second Genome.
        configuration - A Configuration object that provides the parameters required by the algorithm.
        Returns:
        The computed compatibility distance.

      • breed

        static Genome breed(Genome father,
                    Genome mother,
                    InnovationManager iManager,
                    Configuration configuration)
        Breed two Genomes to create a new offspring Genome.
        Parameters:
        father - The first Genome to breed.
        mother - The second Genome to breed.
        iManager - The InnovationManager to use when selecting innovation numbers as part of the breeding process.
        configuration - A Configuration object that provides the parameters required by the algorithm.
        Returns:
        The new Genome.

      • duplicateConnection

        static void duplicateConnection(Connection config,
                                Genome genome,
                                boolean enabled)
        Create a copy of a Connection and the Nodes it depends on and add them to another Genome.
        Parameters:
        config - The Connection to add.
        genome - The Genome to add the Connection to.
        enabled - If true, the Connection will be enabled in the new Genome. If false, it will be disabled.

      • setupInitialSpecies

        static Species setupInitialSpecies(int inputs,
                                   int outputs,
                                   int populationSize,
                                   InnovationManager iManager,
                                   Configuration configuration)
        Set up an initial population of identical Genomes in an initial Species. The template used for the Genomes will have one bias node, plus the specified number of input and output nodes and no hidden nodes. Each bias and input node will have a connection to each output node.
        Parameters:
        inputs - The number of input Nodes that the template Genome will have.
        outputs - The number of output Nodes that the template Genome will have.
        populationSize - The number of Genomes to create.
        iManager - The InnovationManager to use when selecting innovation numbers as part of the Genome creation process.
        configuration - A Configuration object that provides the parameters required by the algorithm.
        Returns:
        The new Species populated with Genomes.
